content: {"name": "Federal Valley Resource Center Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our food pantry serves Athens County and its 6 surrounding counties: \n\nWashington, Meigs, Vinton, Hocking, Perry, and Morgan.", "email": "", "url": "https://federalvalleyresourcecenter.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "8225 Ohio 329", "address_2": null, "city": "Stewart", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "45778", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.3072413, "longitude": -81.8967327}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 662-5605", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": "18:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
